alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Haywood; Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 1:12PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CROCKETT... NORTHEASTERN TIPTON...SOUTHEASTERN LAUDERDALE AND CENTRAL HAYWOOD COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM CST... At 112 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Nutbush, or 10 miles east of Covington, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Bells, Chestnut Bluff, Nutbush, Belle Eagle, Holly Grove, Forked Deer, Maury City, Allens, Christmasville, Jones, Frog Jump, Turnpike, Cotton Lake, Dog Hill, Orysa, Rudolph, Brims Corner, Tibbs, and Durhamville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for west Tennessee.
